title: REPORT: Meghan Markle Notably Absent As Father Undergoes Life-Altering Surgery
description: Meghan Markle was notably absent amid news that her father, Thomas Markle Sr. was rushed into life-saving surgery that required the amputation of his leg.
content:
Meghan Markle was notably absent amid news that her father, Thomas Markle Sr., was rushed into life-saving surgery that required the amputation of his leg, according to a Friday report.
